column2: "Oh, uh, hello there. That was close, I was about to shoot you."
"This is a newly prepared weapon, the bullet bow. I've been using it recently."
"The range is about 2-30 meters, I guess. It's a weapon with a unique parabola."
"When there's the assault rifle, I wonder why people take the time to fire this by hand."
"In order to use the bullet bow, it takes superior breathing and reflexes."
"It combines the power of photons with the thoughts of the person using it."
"When you're pulling the bow back like this, it's best to image the photons being bulleted."
"Also, if there's no wavering in your heart, the arrow won't miss."
"If your arrows don't hit the target, that's probably because you lost focus."
"Well, I'm saying this like I know what I'm talking about, but I'm still learning myself."
"Be careful not to hit anyone while you're still getting used to it."
